TriMeshFlags.description: Flags controlling the behavior of the triangle mesh creation and of some operations involving triangle meshes.

HeightFieldFlags.description: Flags controlling the behavior of some operations involving heightfields.

r.description: Red channel value between 0 and 1. Default is 1.

g.description: Green channel value between 0 and 1. Default is 1.

b.description: Blue channel value between 0 and 1. Default is 1.

Color.description:
Represents a color. See also  {@link  ColorUtils  } .

see  {@link  https://github.com/mrdoob/three.js/blob/master/src/math/Color.js src/math/Color.js }

Side.description: Defines which side of faces will be rendered - front, back or both. Default is  {@link  FrontSide } .

Mapping.description: Texture Mapping Modes for non-cube Textures

MagnificationTextureFilter.description: Texture Magnification Filter Modes. For use with a texture's  {@link  THREE.Texture.magFilter magFilter }  property, these define the texture magnification function to be used when the pixel being textured maps to an area less than or equal to one texture element (texel).

MinificationTextureFilter.description: Texture Minification Filter Modes. For use with a texture's  {@link  THREE.Texture.minFilter minFilter }  property, these define the texture minifying function that is used whenever the pixel being textured maps to an area greater than one texture element (texel).

mask.description: A bit mask storing which of the 32 layers this layers object is currently a member of.

Layers.description: A  {@link  THREE.Layers Layers }  object assigns an  {@link  THREE.Object3D Object3D }  to 1 or more of 32 layers numbered `0` to `31` - internally the layers are stored as a  {@link  https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mask_(computing) bit mask } , and by default all Object3Ds are a member of layer `0`.
